com.team08storyapp

Class NotificationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team08storyapp.NotificationHelper

  • public class NotificationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    NotifictionHelper class helps create a notification in status bar when UpdateTask performs sync in background.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 November 8, 2013
    Author:
    Michele Paulichuk, Alice Wu, Ana Marcu, Jarrett Toll, Jiawei Shen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NotificationHelper(Context context)
      Notification constructor requires a context object to initialize the context field in NotificationHelper class.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void completed()
      called when the background task is complete, this removes the notification from the status bar.
      void createNotification()
      Put the notification into the status bar and initialize the text in this notification.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • NotificationHelper

        public NotificationHelper(Context context)
        Notification constructor requires a context object to initialize the context field in NotificationHelper class.
        Parameters:
        context - a context object of an activity.

    • Method Detail

      • createNotification

        public void createNotification()
        Put the notification into the status bar and initialize the text in this notification. It's called when a new async task is created, and a new notification is needed.

      • completed

        public void completed()
        called when the background task is complete, this removes the notification from the status bar. We could also use this to add a new ‘task complete’ notification
